data.name: Tanki X: Antaeus Skirmisher
data.detailed_description:
This pack contains the following items:

  • Thunder
  • Viking
  • Thunder XT
  • Viking XT
  • Storm Paint

Thunder

The Thunder turret was invented to eliminate the tank armies of the most modern Asian states, when Antaeus was ready to announce that it had completely taken over the world. "X" Tanks underwent a baptism of fire at a time when there were still far fewer of them than the previous generation of tanks. Under these conditions, the Thunder turret provided some assurance that the new tanks would be able to survive. The Thunder turret can be used to strike a group of enemies at once using explosive shells. The quick recharge rate ensures that you will achieve a quick and decisive victory.

Viking

This hull was created during a war that was reaching a stalemate. A tank was needed that could break through the stagnating situation on the front, where winning tactics were needed. This hull is the "universal tactical unit", representing the second generation of "X" Tanks. It is tool that can be used to successfully achieve all tasks on the battlefield. For a long time the Viking formed the basis for bonds between elite professional tank operators.

Note!

You can purchase only 1 Pack per 1 Tanki X account. Refund is not available if you purchase 2 different packs, which include the same weapons, hulls, and skins or you already have the items from the pack! The items will be granted to the account that you use to log into the game through Steam.
data.about_the_game:
This pack contains the following items:

  • Thunder XT
  • Viking XT

data.short_description: The "Viking" and the "Thunder" — the most brutal equipment combination in Tanki X. The ability to deal AOE damage, withstand enemy's attacks and then being able to attack back — isn't this any tanker's dream? The kit also includes the "Storm" paint and an XT skin for both the turret and the hull.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows ХР (Service Pack 3)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4000, 512mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680M or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4000, 512mb
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OS X
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680M or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
